core:description.text: A heavy clay jug glazed with earthy browns, stoppered with a cork and sealed with wax. Inside sloshes a generous measure of amber ale, its yeasty aroma escaping through the seal. The rustic vessel is cool to the touch and beaded with condensation.

items:liquid_container.flavorText: The ale is rich and malty with a slightly bitter hop finish. It goes down smooth, warming your belly and leaving a pleasant earthy aftertaste.
